long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of constantly switching between different applications to save and manage prompt templates? Do you wish there was an easier way to streamline your content creation process?

Introducing our Chrome Extension - the ultimate tool for simplifying your workflow and boosting your productivity. With our popup extension, you can store multiple templates of prompts for ChatGPT, Bing, and more, without having to rely on separate apps or software.

By simply inputting your text into the extension and using the {{prompt}} tag, you can quickly and easily insert your content into a specific place of the template, eliminating the need to type out every part of a prompt.

And with the ability to share templates across different browsers like Chrome and Edge by logging into your account, you can access your favorite prompts on any device.

Say goodbye to wasted time and hello to an all-in-one solution for managing prompt templates with our Chrome Extension. Download it today and start streamlining your content creation process!
